channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Netflix Games loses its vice-president of generative AI
item.description: After embracing generative AI as a core part of its gaming strategy, Netflix's vice president of generative AI has left the company.

item.title: Nunu.ai raises $6M for AI agents dubbed ‘unembodied minds’ for game testing
item.description: Nunu.ai has raised $6 million and unveiled Unembodied Minds, or AI agents designed for game testing and to control any given body as needed.

item.title: Nous Research just launched an API that gives developers access to AI models that OpenAI and Anthropic won’t build
item.description: Nous Research's new API for "unrestricted" Hermes 3 and DeepHermes-3 AI models features toggle-on reasoning and a developer-first approach.

item.title: Gemini Robotics uses Google’s top language model to make robots more useful

item.title: Why OnRobot isn’t betting on turnkey robotic systems

item.title: I invested $4,000 in 2020 when the market crashed. It’s now worth $55,000 with 65% in Nvidia. Am I now in trouble?
item.description: “I’ve been disabled from anorexia and postural orthostatic tachycardia syndrome for the past five years.”

item.title: Wells Fargo’s stock rises as analyst proclaims ‘good entry point’ for investors
item.description: RBC Capital says Wells Fargo’s stock is a good buy after the recent financial-stock selloff, though most bank stocks remain in the red.
